children.name: What is your current role at your organization?
How many years have you been in (corporate real estate, interior design, workplace management)?
From your perspective, what are the key predictions for the future of the workplace in the next 5-10 years?
Are companies motivated to bring people back into the office? If so, what are their motivations?
How are companies optimizing their physical office spaces for collaboration and productivity?
What does it look like for organizational leadership to measure the long-term impacts of in-person interactions in the physical workplace?
Impacts on Real Estate and Workforces
What challenges and opportunities does corporate eladership foresee in navigating the evolving landscape of workplace design and corporate real estate?
How do you view the distribution of work across the city? (Home, work, 3rd places?)
In the hybrid model, how are companies deciding on the locations of their physical offices?
How would you characterize the future of office layouts?
How are companies gathering and incorporating employee feedback into the decision-making process for workplace design?
How are advancements in technology influencing the design of the modern workplace?
Do you thinkthe growing adoption across multiple domains will influence the employees' experience with the workplace?
